name: ICapabilityInvalidationListener
description: A listener for block capability invalidation. Register with ServerLevel.registerCapabilityListener(net.minecraft.core.BlockPos, net.neoforged.neoforge.capabilities.ICapabilityInvalidationListener) . The listener will be held by a weak reference, so it is important to keep a strong reference to it as long as you need it.

methods.name: onInvalidate
methods.description: Called when capabilities are invalidated. The listener should check that it is valid before reacting to this notification, and if it is not valid anymore, it should return false .
